did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Economic Development Administration reports, Department of Transportation reports, and several reports and papers dealing with regional science topics.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor, Department of Urban Studies and Planning, Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Economic Development Administration reports, Department of Transportation reports, and several reports and papers dealing with regional science topics.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Karen R. Polenske. Reports, #4369. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
